worldtimer 0.0.0.9000
  • Reference
  • Changelog

Send Requests to WorldTimeAPI

Source: R/worldtimer.R
worldtimer-functions.Rd

Functions to talk to the WorldTimeAPI http://worldtimeapi.org

Usage

worldtimer(resource, ...)

worldtimer_timezones()

worldtimer_ip(ipv4 = NULL)

Arguments

resource

Path in the WorldTimeAPI. Normally either a valid timezone or an IP.

...

Arguments passed on to httr2::resp_body_json

resp

A response object.

check_type

Check that response has expected content type? Set to FALSE to suppress the automated check

simplifyVector

Should JSON arrays containing only primitives (i.e. booleans, numbers, and strings) be caused to atomic vectors?

ipv4

An ipv4 address for which to return the current time.

Value

list of class worldtimer

Examples

# \donttest{
# Change R option for printing decimals digits of seconds
old <- options(digits.secs = 6)

# Specific timezone
tz <- try(worldtimer("America/New_York"))
str(tz)
#> List of 14
#>  $ abbreviation: chr "EDT"
#>  $ datetime    : chr "2022-03-21T18:26:09.683030-04:00"
#>  $ day_of_week : int 1
#>  $ day_of_year : int 80
#>  $ dst         : logi TRUE
#>  $ dst_from    : chr "2022-03-13T07:00:00+00:00"
#>  $ dst_offset  : int 3600
#>  $ dst_until   : chr "2022-11-06T06:00:00+00:00"
#>  $ raw_offset  : int -18000
#>  $ timezone    : chr "America/New_York"
#>  $ unixtime    : int 1647901569
#>  $ utc_datetime: POSIXct[1:1], format: "2022-03-21 22:26:09.68303"
#>  $ utc_offset  : chr "-04:00"
#>  $ week_number : int 12
#>  - attr(*, "class")= chr "worldtimer"
print(tz)
#> [1] "2022-03-21 18:26:09.68303 EDT"

# The runner's public ip
runner_ip <- worldtimer_ip()
str(runner_ip)
#> List of 14
#>  $ abbreviation: chr "EDT"
#>  $ datetime    : chr "2022-03-21T18:26:09.738710-04:00"
#>  $ day_of_week : int 1
#>  $ day_of_year : int 80
#>  $ dst         : logi TRUE
#>  $ dst_from    : chr "2022-03-13T07:00:00+00:00"
#>  $ dst_offset  : int 3600
#>  $ dst_until   : chr "2022-11-06T06:00:00+00:00"
#>  $ raw_offset  : int -18000
#>  $ timezone    : chr "America/New_York"
#>  $ unixtime    : int 1647901569
#>  $ utc_datetime: POSIXct[1:1], format: "2022-03-21 22:26:09.73870"
#>  $ utc_offset  : chr "-04:00"
#>  $ week_number : int 12
#>  - attr(*, "class")= chr "worldtimer"
print(runner_ip)
#> [1] "2022-03-21 18:26:09.73870 EDT"

# Other public ip
other_ip <- worldtimer_ip("101.110.34.62")
str(other_ip)
#> List of 14
#>  $ abbreviation: chr "JST"
#>  $ datetime    : chr "2022-03-22T07:26:09.757339+09:00"
#>  $ day_of_week : int 2
#>  $ day_of_year : int 81
#>  $ dst         : logi FALSE
#>  $ dst_from    : NULL
#>  $ dst_offset  : int 0
#>  $ dst_until   : NULL
#>  $ raw_offset  : int 32400
#>  $ timezone    : chr "Asia/Tokyo"
#>  $ unixtime    : int 1647901569
#>  $ utc_datetime: POSIXct[1:1], format: "2022-03-21 22:26:09.75733"
#>  $ utc_offset  : chr "+09:00"
#>  $ week_number : int 12
#>  - attr(*, "class")= chr "worldtimer"
print(other_ip)
#> [1] "2022-03-22 07:26:09.75733 JST"

# Restore old options
options(old)
# }
